channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- fitness calculators
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- fitness calculators

item.title: CVE-2021-24272|2024-08-03T19:28:22.755Z -- unknown -- fitness%20calculators
item.description: The fitness calculators WordPress plugin before 1.9.6 add calculators for Water intake, BMI calculator, protein Intake, and Body Fat and was lacking CSRF check, allowing attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions, such as change the calculator headers. Due to the lack of sanitisation, this could also lead to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
